name: Project KART (bl4z3_yt)
description:
<----!GAME IS STILL IN EARLY ACCESS, NOT ALL CONTENT IS INCLUDED, ALL CONTENT WILL BE MADE AVALIABLE FOR FREE TO OWNERS OF THE GAME AS IT RELEASES!---->

Project KART is a single player "go for the highscore" type game, containing an ending goal of 12 tracks. Compete with your friends for the ability to hold the highscore.

With planned achievements coming to the game, you'll get even more goals to work towards, till 1.0, which will containing at least 12 tracks (maybe even more!) and achievements. Compete with your friends for the fastest time, just don't let it ruin your friendships. (Mario Kart, lookin at you)

Join The MinoDab Productions Discord At: https://discord.gg/VjdFsgy3av
